subject: p10268877
Findings: Comparison is made with prior study. There is moderate cardiomegaly. Left lower lobe consolidation has increased, worrisome for worsening pneumonia. There is also increase of loss of volume in the left lower lobe. Right PICC tip is in the mid-to-lower SVC. ET tube is in a standard position. NG tube tip is out of view below the diaphragm. There is no pneumothorax or pleural effusion. Right lower lobe medial opacities are likely atelectasis.
